testcase.name: Verify community forum search functionality with valid data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and opencart app is opened...........................passed Then User navigates onto landing page and able to see logo..................passed When User clicks on resources dropdown......................................passed And User clicks on community forum..........................................passed Then User navigates on community forum page.................................passed Then User click on dropdown list of search button and select Unanswered topics option.passed When User fills the data from given sheetname "Sheet1" and rownumber 0......passed And clicks on search icon...................................................passed Then User is able to see all the related topics.............................passed

testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and opencart app is opened...........................passed Then User navigates onto landing page and able to see logo..................passed When User clicks on resources dropdown......................................passed And User clicks on community forum..........................................passed Then User navigates on community forum page.................................passed Then User click on dropdown list of search button and select Unanswered topics option.passed When User fills the data from given sheetname "Sheet1" and rownumber 1......passed And clicks on search icon...................................................passed Then User is able to see all the related topics.............................passed
